title: Fareit password stealer
extract: FAREIT is a malware family of information stealers used to download other malware such as ZeuS/ZBOT onto infected systems. Its variants typically steal user names and passwords on stored in web browsers.
extract_html: FAREIT is a malware family of information stealers used to download other malware such as ZeuS/ZBOT onto infected systems. Its variants typically steal user names and passwords on stored in web browsers.
